cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP address to the same value as the remote SCTP address causes an IP address conflict and wrong routing definitions, making the CU attempt to connect to itself and resulting in unreachable elements.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB absolute frequency to 0 causes frequency misalignment, as it is out of the valid range for band 78, leading to invalid SSB transmission and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 絕對頻率設定為 0 會導致頻率錯位，因為它超出了 band 78 的有效範圍，導致無效的 SSB 傳輸和細胞設定失敗。
